text: mariyu allah grantha prajalato: "Dinini (daivapravakta muham'mad ranunnadu ane satyanni) prajalaku teliyajeyandi mariyu danini dacakandi." Ani ceyincina pramananni, (jnapakam cesukondi). Kani varu danini tama vipula venuka padavesi daniki baduluga svalpa mulyanni pondaru, vari i vyaparam enta nicamainadi
